announce
********


Description
===========

Manage Oracle Cloud Infrastructure console announcements.


Available Commands
==================

* announcement-subscription

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * create-filter-group

  * delete

  * delete-filter-group

  * get

  * list

  * update

  * update-filter-group

* announcements

  * get

  * list

* announcements-preferences

  * create

  * get

  * list

  * update

* service

  * list

* user-status

  * get

  * update
